channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for PA

item.title: Report X-2023090575
item.description:
Report X-2023090575

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-05T15:12:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-06
  • City: ZELIENOPLE
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: unload manager called Qa for a Hazmat spill. He said the pallet had tipped over in transit and when the package handler was unloading it the one on the bottom started leaking. Qa came with spill pads and a tote. The leaker was put in a tote. When QA came to clean up spill, we realized that the Hazmat was leaking all the way down the trailer and outside. We immediately called ERTS. Hazmat cleaning company came and cleaned up the spill. They immediately put the leaker in a salvage drum. No pictures were taken and not exactly sure how many leaked out. This leaker also damaged 4 other Hazmat's. DescribePack: The pallet had tipped over during transit causing the Hazmat on the bottom to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The hazmat was put in a tote and spill pads were put down in the trailer.

item.title: Report X-2023090550
item.description:
Report X-2023090550

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-05T15:12:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-07
  • City: LEWISBERRY
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Shipment taken out of system flow due to external carton wet. Upon inspecting the inner contents of 4 x 1 gallon plastic bottles of Nu Brite Condenser Coil Cleaner. The 2 x 1 gallon plastic bottles of Nu Brite Condenser Coil Cleaner had crushed in caps allowing .10 gallons to release from each bottle. There was a corrugated liner to separate plastic bottles and a liner used on the top of bottles for packing. Facility procedures for damaged hazardous materials followed, contents contained and awaiting disposition. DescribePack: The 2 x 1 gallon plastic bottles of Nu Brite Condenser Coil Cleaner had crushed in caps allowing .10 gallons to release. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a lined red tote to contain the leaking box, then was taken to the hazmat cage for further inspection.

item.title: Report X-2023090533
item.description:
Report X-2023090533

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-05T15:12:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-06
  • City: NEWVILLE
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was brought over toe QA by an Ops. Manager working on a van line. DescribePack: The box broke. There was a rip in the box. There was some moisture to the box as well. The box was not examined and it is not clear how much, if any, spilled. No spills were evident outside of the container. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a bag and then inside a tote on the van line. It was then brought to QA. QA plans to take this tote over to the hazmat cage to await the disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023090408
item.description:
Report X-2023090408

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-03
  • City: NORTHAMPTON
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Found the damaged hazmat in a red hazardous tote on the Hazmat pallet in QA, grabbed my PPE to inspect the pail. DescribePack: There is a dent on the body of the pail at the top near the removable lid. There is some yellow paint on the pail over the wrap and under the wrap. The paint over the wrap had dried up and stiffened. The paint underneath the wrap is still wet. DurationRel: 24 and MitigateEffect: Kept upright, placed in red hazardous tote and was brought to QA to be inspected.

item.title: Report E-2023090846
item.description:
Report E-2023090846

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-03T15:13:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-30
  • City: WEST CHESTER
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: This pail was loaded onto a pallet along with three rolls of roof membrane. When the pallet was picked up the metal band that was securing the rolls to the pallet broke causing the three rolls of membrane to shift and consequently crush the metal pail which in turn caused the unintentional release. Spilled material was cleaned with absorbent and placed into a recovery container as was the crushed pail.

item.title: Report X-2023090327
item.description:
Report X-2023090327

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: ZELIENOPLE
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This hazmat was damaged during the unload process. It was placed in a plastic lined bin. DescribePack: The package had pressure put on it during the unload process and that caused the bottle to become dented and liquid to come out of the cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a plastic lined hazmat bin.
